Simplifying, the variance for Lottery A is approximately \(0.001 \times (6000 - 6)^2 + 0.999 \times (0 - 6)^2 = 0.001 \times 5994^2 + 0.999 \times (-6)^2\) and for Lottery B is \(0.002 \times (3000 - 6)^2 + 0.998 \times (0 - 6)^2 = 0.002 \times 2994^2 + 0.998 \times (-6)^2\).
